alert.note: Alert for Schuyler (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 22 at 7:08PM EDT until July 22 at 8:00PM EDT by NWS Binghamton
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 745 PM EDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN SENECA...NORTHEASTERN SCHUYLER...SOUTHERN CAYUGA AND NORTHWESTERN TOMPKINS COUNTIES... At 708 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Hector, or near Dundee, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Hector, Covert, Trumansburg, Interlaken, Caywood, Townsendville, King Ferry, Taughannock Falls, Searsburg and Kidders. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
